titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE INCOMPLETE LOCAL APPEALS (REPORTING PERIOD END) - Description

div.p: NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE INCOMPLETE LOCAL APPEALS (REPORTING PERIOD END) is the total number of incomplete NHS Continuing Healthcare Local Appeals at the end of the REPORTING PERIOD.

NHS CONTINUING HEALTHCARE INCOMPLETE LOCAL APPEALS (REPORTING PERIOD END) includes any NHS Continuing Healthcare Local Appeals received but not yet actioned or any which are in progress but have not reached the point at which a decision letter (or other communication of appeal outcome) has been sent.
